A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I usually love Star Wars movies\, and I have many friends who loved this movie. The problem is that it just wasn't that great. Deaths felt unearned\, certain sequences seemed very unnecessary\, and the attack on the resistance was the slowest chase in all of movie history. No spoilers here\, but this is not the Luke Skywalker we've seen before\, and it's not one we should have ever seen. We watch movies to see our heroes overcome\, not fade away.
